fields.Name: Zoom In & Out devtools
fields.Description: Can I zoom in and out of the devtools panel?

Chrome.Notes:
1. Open **Command Menu** and Run > "Zoom in" or `Cmd+` or `Ctrl+` to increase the zoom level.
2. Run > "Zoom out" or `Cmd-` or `Ctrl-` to decrease the zoom level.
3. Run > "Reset zoom level" or `Cmd+0` or `Ctrl+0` to reset the zoom level.
Chrome.Name: Zoom In & Out devtools
